question: 野獣
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>field</kanji> <kanji>beast/animal</kanji> is one that lives outside and not under human care. It is a <vocabulary>wild beast</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>wild animal</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
